com.google.code.rees.scope.util.thread
Interface ThreadTask

All Known Implementing Classes:
TimeoutTask, WaitTask
public interface ThreadTask

This interface provides a simple mechanism that can be implemented for adding tasks to a TaskThread

Author:
rees.byars

Method Summary
 void cancel()
          Cancels this task, after which calls to isActive() return false
 void doTask()
          The basic task to be performed by this task.
 boolean isActive()
          indicates whether or not this tasks doTask() method should continue to be called by its TaskThread
 

Method Detail

isActive

boolean isActive()
indicates whether or not this tasks doTask() method should continue to be called by its TaskThread

Returns:

cancel

void cancel()
Cancels this task, after which calls to isActive() return false

doTask

void doTask()
The basic task to be performed by this task. Will continue being called until isActive() returns false or the task is removed from its TaskThread using TaskThread.removeTask(ThreadTask). The frequency with which this task will be executed will be dependent upon the other tasks that are added to the TaskThread.
